item.title: ts-jest-vue
item.description: ts-jest vue 問題 Logo.spec.js -> Logo.spec.ts にリネームしてyarn testしたらエラー test/Logo.spec.ts 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 import { mount } from '@vue/test-utils' import Logo from '@/components/Logo.vue' describe('Logo', () => { test('is a Vue instance', () => { const wrapper = mount(Logo) expect(wrapper.vm).toBeTruthy() }) }) 1 2 3 4
